DOC.detailed_description: Part A : An interventional , double-blind , randomize , placebo-control design use test JBT-101 22 eligible male female subject ≥ 18 ≤ 70 year age moderate-to-severely active skin-predominant dermatomyositis . Part B : A one-year open-label design test JBT-101 subject complete Part A without permanent discontinuation study product safety tolerability reason .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria ( Part A ) : CDASI activity score ≥ 14 ; No difficulty lift walking , 1.5 x upper limit normal creatine phosphokinase aldolase ; Failed least 3 month treatment hydroxychloroquine ; Stable treatment dermatomyositis least 28 day Visit 1 ( Day 1 ) .
